assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was conducted according to the guidelines of the Declaration of Helsinki, and approved by the Ethics Committee of the European Institute of Oncology (UID 0833, date of approval 23/05/2018). Informed consent was obtained from all patients involved in the study.
